title: Support for Pixel 5 in India
content:
Hello community,

I am interested to import a Google Pixel 5 to India. I just wanted to know if the phone will be supported in India for repair parts.

For example, if I break my Pixel 5 screen, can it be fixed in India by Google partnered service centres?

Also, will the Indian careers/telecom be supported?

Thanks in advance.

Regards,
Animekh Misra
